/.flexos/specs/002-features_product-list.title: Artisan Product Listing & Management
/.flexos/specs/002-features_product-list.description: Empowers artisans to effortlessly create detailed product listings with multiple images, comprehensive descriptions, pricing, inventory tracking, and shipping options. They can also edit or remove listings easily through their dashboard.

/.flexos/specs/003-pages_shop-browse-pag.title: Shop / Browse Products Page
/.flexos/specs/003-pages_shop-browse-pag.description: The main product discovery page, displaying a grid of handmade items. Users can browse by categories, apply various filters, and use a search bar to find specific crafts.

/.flexos/specs/004-flows_buyer-purchases.title: Buyer Purchases an Item Flow
/.flexos/specs/004-flows_buyer-purchases.description: A buyer browses products, adds them to a cart, and completes a secure checkout process.

/.flexos/specs/005-database_products.md.title: Products Data Collection
/.flexos/specs/005-database_products.md.description: Contains details for all handmade products listed by artisans.
